The 12th Islamic Consultative Assembly (Persian: دوره دوازدهم مجلس شورای اسلامی) is the 36th and current Parliament of Iran that commenced on 27 May 2024 following the legislative elections on 1 March and 10 May 2024.
Composition
245 representatives have been elected in the first round of the legislative elections held on 1 March 2024. The second round to elect the 45 remaining seats was  held on 10 May 2024.
References
# [https://www.crisisgroup.org/middle-east-north-africa/gulf-and-arabian-peninsula/iran/closing-circles-irans-exclusionary-2024 Closing Circles: Iran's Exclusionary 2024 Elections]. International Crisis Group 12 MARCH 2024
# [https://www.mizanonline.ir/fa/news/4772522/%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%A7%D9%85%DB%8C-%DA%A9%D8%A7%D9%85%D9%84-%D9%86%D9%85%D8%A7%DB%8C%D9%86%D8%AF%DA%AF%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%AF%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%B2%D8%AF%D9%87%D9%85%DB%8C%D9%86-%D8%AF%D9%88%D8%B1%D9%87-%D9%85%D8%AC%D9%84%D8%B3-%D8%B4%D9%88%D8%B1%D8%A7%DB%8C-%D8%A7%D8%B3%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%85%DB%8C اسامی کامل نمایندگان دوازدهمین دوره مجلس شورای اسلامی]. Mizan News Agency 11 May 2024
